Reactivating the Best Buddies Club at Qatar University
22  February,  2024
Reactivating the Best Buddies Club at Qatar University by participating with an awareness booth at the Student Clubs Fair at the University throughout the week, to introduce the vision and mission of the initiative in social integration and to encourage joining the club.
